Posts.Title: new to forum, diagnostic mammo and ultrasound found large lumps

Posts.Content: I am usually in the Anxiety forums, however I was clicking around in others and found this thread. Just wanted to send you so much strength exqualls. I'm so sorry you're going through this, but your grace and bravery is admirable. Love and light to you!

Posts.Content:
I'm usually in the Anxiety forums, but was clicking around and ended up here. 
I mostly just wanted to say it sounds like you'll be a great caregiver for your sister. I'm so sorry you guys are going through this. Strength to you both!
